metadata.title: CVE-2017-9989 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: util/outputtxt.c in libming 0.4.8 mishandles memory allocation. A craftedinput will lead to a remote denial of service (NULL pointer dereference)attack.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
